a) 
A = 101010
B = 001100 &
-----------
    001000

b) 
A =  1111111 
B =  1000000

42_10 = 101010

 1000000 |
----------
 1111111

1111111 
0101010 XOR
-----------
1010101

f)
A = 00111100
B = 00001111
C = 0x15 -> 00010101

00111100
00001111 &
----------
00001100
00010101 XOR
------------
00011001
